description: The program program works great with my old scanner, saving single and multi-page images and documents in JPEG, TIFF and PDF formats. Easy to use. My only beef is that avoiding saving two images of the last page of a multi-page document has escaped me. I have tried all combinations of the Scan, Scan+, Save, and Save+ buttons. My fault, I guess.
summary: Works great with my old scanner

description: Easy to use; supports all sorts of printers and scanners. Been using for about 10 years. Highly recommended

I simply was sick of fiddling around with insane HP-Scanner drivers on Linux!! First tested the freeware version then decided to purchase the "huge" version, because I don't wanted to be restricted to flatbed scanning and wanted to use all features of my all in one HP-Color-Laser M280nw.
summary: It sets a full-stop to all HP-Scanner-Driver Problems under Linux

description:
Application pointue pour les utilisateurs exigents.
Reglages fins.
